name: Petit Novel series - Harvest December
description:
"Petit Novel series - Harvest December" is a collection of 13 stories set in the small, snowy town of Tagami.

Follow Masaki Konno, a teenager prone to falling into sticky situations through his last year of high school.

Each month is a new story that connects and leads up to the final installment, "Perfect December".

Sometimes heartwarming, sometimes violent, sometimes comical, often mystical - for Tagami is known to be a land where a god resides...
